originalText.text: I highly recommend this Taekwondo school. The master is super! All the kids and all the parents love him. He knows perfectly how to talk and interact with children, even the most active. Master Shin has a lot of patience, focused on Taekwondo techniques, but also on teaching to the kids the kindness and respect of each other, things that I really appreciate. My son loves to go there as much as he can and I‚Äôm sure, it wouldn‚Äôt be the same with one other teacher. Furthermore, the price is really excellent! The cheapest in the aerea. Absolutely best master and best martial arts school, we couldn‚Äôt find better! Thanks a lot Master Shin

originalText.text: Best place ever! I couldn't be happier to experience learning Taekwondo from Instructor David. He is such natural with children as well as adults, and it's so clear how much he cares about each one. Thank you Sir!

text.text: Best place ever! I couldn't be happier to experience learning Taekwondo from Instructor David. He is such natural with children as well as adults, and it's so clear how much he cares about each one. Thank you Sir!

originalText.text:
Champions Martial Arts Lenox Hill is an excellent MA school.
Master Seise is very proficient. He builds great relationships with kids. His classes help to improve overall fitness, strength and confidence level in kids. In addition to giving instructions, he explains why he wants his students to do what he asks them to do. This builds a much deeper understanding of Taekwondo techniques and martial arts in general. He makes classes exciting for kids and at the same time teaches discipline and respect. My 7 year old son is always looking forward to his Taekwondo classes with Master Seise. My son is not just mastering his forms and techniques there. I've seen a lot of improvement in his attention, focus and self-discipline.
I highly recommend this school.

He makes classes exciting for kids and at the same time teaches discipline and respect. My 7 year old son is always looking forward to his Taekwondo classes with Master Seise. originalText.text: Great place to master Taekwondo. They have classes for all skills and ages, starting from 3 year old to 73 year olds. They are graded according to age as well as skill, so even if your kid is young, They might join older kids to practice advanced technique. There are also mixed martial arts and defense technique classes. Master Seise has wonderful attention to  detail and works closely with you to perfect your form.
